1280610.name: Stack It
1280610.description:
Stack various objects alone, together or against each other to build the highest tower you can build.
In Stack It you use a whole variety of different objects to build as high of a tower as you can. Play solo mode and try to reach great heights or race against time. And if you like to play with friends you can compete with up to 3 people to build towards the finish line, but if cooperation is more your style you can also build together.
Each object is unique and some even have special abilities that can help or hinder you.

Features

  • Stack objects on top of each other to build as high as tower you can.
  • Compete or work together with up to 3 people locally.
  • Full modding support. Add your own objects or levels.
  • Tons of different objects, some with special abilities.
  • Multiple game modes to choose from.
+ More to be announced!
